00036 const char *Hyperspace::Protocol::commandStrings[COMMAND_MAX] = {
00037   "keepalive",
00038   "handshake",
00039   "open",
00040   "stat",
00041   "cancel",
00042   "close",
00043   "poison",

00057 
00061 const char *Hyperspace::Protocol::command_text(short command) {
00062   if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00063     return "UNKNOWN";
00064   return commandStrings[command];
00065 }

00070 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_client_keepalive_request(uint64_t sessionId, uint64_t lastKnownEvent) {
00071   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00072   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 18);
00073   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00074   cbuf->append_long(sessionId);
00075   cbuf->append_long(lastKnownEvent);
00076   return cbuf;
00077 }

00083 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(uint64_t sessionId, int error) {
00084   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00085   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 14);
00086   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00087   cbuf->append_long(sessionId);
00088   cbuf->append_int(error);
00089   cbuf->append_int(0);
00090   return cbuf;
00091 }

00093 
00097 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(SessionDataPtr &sessionPtr) {
00098   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(sessionPtr->mutex);
00099   CommBuf *cbuf = 0;
00100   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00101   uint32_t len = 18;
00102   list<Notification *>::iterator iter;
00103 
00104   for (iter = sessionPtr->notifications.begin(); iter != sessionPtr->notifications.end(); iter++) {
00105     len += 8;  // handle
00106     len += (*iter)->eventPtr->encoded_length();
00107   }
00108 
00109   cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, len);
00110   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_KEEPALIVE);
00111   cbuf->append_long(sessionPtr->id);
00112   cbuf->append_int(Error::OK);
00113   cbuf->append_int(sessionPtr->notifications.size());
00114   for (iter = sessionPtr->notifications.begin(); iter != sessionPtr->notifications.end(); iter++) {
00115     cbuf->append_long((*iter)->handle);
00116     (*iter)->eventPtr->encode(cbuf);
00121   }
00122 
00123   return cbuf;
00124 }

00130 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_handshake_request(uint64_t sessionId) {
00131   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00132   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 10);
00133   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_HANDSHAKE);
00134   cbuf->append_long(sessionId);
00135   return cbuf;
00136 }

00142 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_open_request(std::string &name, uint32_t flags, HandleCallbackPtr &callbackPtr, std::vector<AttributeT> &initAttrs) {
00143   size_t len = 14 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(name);
00144   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, fileNameToGroupId(name));
00145   for (size_t i=0; i<initAttrs.size(); i++)
00146     len += Serialization::encoded_length_string(name) + Serialization::encoded_length_byte_array(initAttrs[i].valueLen);
00147 
00148   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, len);
00149 
00150   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_OPEN);
00151   cbuf->append_int(flags);
00152   if (callbackPtr)
00153     cbuf->append_int(callbackPtr->get_event_mask());
00154   else
00155     cbuf->append_int(0);
00156   cbuf->append_string(name);
00157 
00158   // append initial attributes
00159   cbuf->append_int(initAttrs.size());
00160   for (size_t i=0; i<initAttrs.size(); i++) {
00161     cbuf->append_string(initAttrs[i].name);
00162     cbuf->append_byte_array(initAttrs[i].value, initAttrs[i].valueLen);
00163   }
00164 
00165   return cbuf;
00166 }

00168 
00169 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_close_request(uint64_t handle) {
00170   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL));
00171   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 10);
00172   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_CLOSE);
00173   cbuf->append_long(handle);
00174   return cbuf;
00175 }

00177 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_mkdir_request(std::string &name) {
00178   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, fileNameToGroupId(name));
00179   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(name));
00180   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_MKDIR);
00181   cbuf->append_string(name);
00182   return cbuf;
00183 }

00195 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_attr_set_request(uint64_t handle, std::string &name, const void *value, size_t valueLen) {
00196   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL));
00197   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 10 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(name) + Serialization::encoded_length_byte_array(valueLen));
00198   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_ATTRSET);
00199   cbuf->append_long(handle);
00200   cbuf->append_string(name);
00201   cbuf->append_byte_array(value, valueLen);
00202   return cbuf;
00203 }

00244 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_lock_request(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, bool tryAcquire) {
00245   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE, (uint32_t)((handle ^ (handle >> 32)) & 0x0FFFFFFFFLL));
00246   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 15);
00247   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_LOCK);
00248   cbuf->append_long(handle);
00249   cbuf->append_int(mode);
00250   cbuf->append_byte(tryAcquire);
00251   return cbuf;
00252 }

00267 CommBuf *Hyperspace::Protocol::create_status_request() {
00268   HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERSPACE);
00269   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2);
00270   cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_STATUS);
00271   return cbuf;
